friends.map: function(doc) {    var date = new Date();    var timestamp = date.getTime() / 1000;    if (!doc.hasOwnProperty("friends_updated_at")) {doc.friends_updated_at = 0;}    if (!doc.hasOwnProperty("stream_user")) {doc.stream_user = false;}    if (doc.stream_user && timestamp - doc.friends_updated_at > 604800                                          ) {        emit([doc.friends_updated_at, doc.inserted_time]);}}
